title: Operator Foil Stamping
tagsAndSkills: Foil stamping,Material Handling,Machine Operation,Packaging,Troubleshooting,Foil stamping Operator,Materials,Machine
jobDescription:
Key Responsibilities:
Machine Operation: Set up and operate foil stamping machines according to job specifications and work orders.
Quality Control: Inspect materials before and after stamping to ensure they meet quality standards and customer requirements.
Material Handling: Load foil and other materials into the machine, ensuring proper alignment and setup.
Maintenance: Perform routine maintenance on foil stamping machines, including cleaning, lubrication, and minor repairs to ensure optimal performance.
Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve any issues with the stamping process, such as misalignment, foil defects, or machine malfunctions.

title: Urgently Hiring For Site Head @ Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: site head,Team Management,Revenue Generation,Real Estate,mandate projects,property sales,Sourcing,Channel Partners
jobDescription:
Greetings from REMARCO... !!


About us :


Remarco is created with a mission to redefine the quality of real estate solutions provided today. Our innovative blend of technology and human touch streamlines property management and digital marketing for real estate - setting a new standard of excellence. Armed with a team of seasoned professionals - we bring 10+ years of industry knowledge and on-ground experience to you. This, along with an in-depth understanding of the home-buyer journey makes us the go-to partner for developers who aspire to take their projects to new, unprecedented heights.


What is our requirement?


Position - Site Head
Experience - 6+ Years
Gender - Male
Site Location - Upper Kharghar, Panvel and Taloja


Responsibilities

  • Responsible for site Operations & revenue management along with demand generation and sales closures.
  • Developing Sales strategies and visualizing the sales targets till accomplishment.
  • Preparing sales budget and sales plan for sustenance and launch sales.
  • Responsible for sales target settings and helping and motivating team members to achieve the same.
  • Responsible for marketing initiatives and brand enhancement with the marketing team.
  • Assist in developing marketing & sales strategies to build consumer preference and drive volumes
  • Maintaining a strong relationship with the working Channel Partners to ensure business continuity
  • To provide inputs pertaining to planning, designing, pricing strategy,competition analysis,events & promotions and estimation of revenue generation for the project.
  • Devising team KPIs & guiding the team to achieve the sales targets. Provide inputs pertaining to sales performance, market competition, sales projection as an input. Review tasks completed by team members and conduct regular
  • performance reviews. Handle daily operations including internal company CRM tools. Take ownership and initiative to hone up real estate knowledge and stay up-to-date with rules & regulations in the Indian real estate market.
  • Maintain cordial relationships with prospective Builders and Prospective buyers and other customers of the company.
  • Prepare MIS for review purpose on daily basis and provide consolidated reports to the management with site Profit & loss statements.
  • Ensure to achieve allocated business targets within stipulated time frame

Why Join Us?


  • Excellent Inputs & Real Time Support given by management to achieve realistic targets
  • Professional development & career advancement opportunities within the REMARCO
  • Young & Vibrant work Culture.
  • Reimbursement of fixed travelling & actual mobile expenses.

Requirement:

  • Must have Real Estate background, Team handling exp,, should have handled sites Independently in Mumbai/Navi Mumbai/Thane, preferably.
  • Polished appearance and professional demeanor.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast paced, dynamic environment.
  • Excellent negotiation and closing skills.
  • Self-Motivated and goal oriented.
  • Excellent communication skills & interpersonal skills
  • Confident and have a positive approach towards the team.
  • Flexibility to work in multiple sales sites in the same city
  • Should Be organized, self disciplined And Self Starter.
  • Must Be Ready To Learn And Grow With The Company

What we give you?


Fixed Salary + Monthly Incentives + yearly Increment


How to Apply?

Kindly share your resume on HR@remarco.co.in and for more details

Contact on 8655912177

title: Urgently hiring For Sourcing Manager (Mandate)@Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Channel Partners,CP Aquisition,brokerOnboarding,Sourcing,Residential Sales,Communication Skills,Real Estate Sales,Revenue Generation
jobDescription:
Greetings from REMARCO... !!


About us :

We at REMARCO are a full stack support system for the Developers for Strategy, execution, deployment, financing and bringing sales at higher pace thus saving developer efforts for team management, finance cost, brand building and project liquidation. With operations in 8+ metro cities, key market insights, & an enhanced customer service team - were here to guide the developers at every step of the way. Our expertise lies in building a strong sales & strategy pipeline for the developers through innovative usage of Technology & strong legacy of over a decade in the industry.


What is our requirement?
Role: Sourcing Manager (Mandate Project) Upper Kharghar, Panvel and Taloja

Job Location : Navi Mumbai / Multiple Sites
Experience : Min 2 Years
Vehicle : Mandatory


Responsibilities

  • Be responsible for onboarding new channel partners for our key projects across Navi Mumbai & activate maximum channel partners through strong relationship building & continuous efforts.
  • Ensure smooth registration, application & process training, certification & commission disbursal for channel partners.
  • Motivate channel partners to be aligned with company's focus to liquidate projects and generate site visits through the Channel Partners thus ensuring that the business numbers are achieved.
  • Be updated with the real estate market, gather market Intelligence, understand the target audience, build product features around the requirements and communicate accordingly.
  • Consistently identify and qualify leads in designated markets through B2B and B2C sales calls. Leverage on a strong network of Channel Partners (CP) and existing customers to achieve set targets. Help Channel partners to activate their database, plan dedicated support to help them reach their database.
  • Conduct Channel Partners meetings on sites during launches and during sustenance and arrange Channel Partner meets for project activations.
  • Consistently build on the Channel Partners network to acquire new business and manage clients in collaboration with them and keep higher activation rate.
  • Conduct regular meetings with Channel Partners with the purpose of both engagement and empowerment to drive more business.
  • Quarterly review of Channel Partners including actual achievement v/s targets, qualitative factors and process improvements
  • Making sales presentations to key decision makers effectively selling the capabilities & service offerings of the property

Why Join Us?

  • Excellent Inputs & Real Time Support given by management to achieve realistic targets
  • Professional development & career advancement opportunities within the REMARCO
  • Young & Vibrant work Culture.
  • Reimbursement of fixed traveling & actual mobile expenses.

Requirement:

  • Self-assured self-starter who is eager to work alone and with cross-functional partners and senior management teams.
  • Real Estate Sourcing Experience: 3 year and above particularly in Mumbai Market.
  • Must Have: More than 50 active Channel Partners network
  • Good interpersonal skills, communication and ability to convince the target audience.
  • Must Have: Two Wheeler along with a valid license.
  • Qualification: Graduation Not Required.
  • Languages: English (conversational), Hindi and Marathi will be an added advantage

What we give you?

Fixed Salary + Monthly Incentives + Half yearly Increment


Contact No- 8655912177

title: Manager Process Engineering
tagsAndSkills: Technology Transfer,Chemical Engineering,Process Development,HSEQ improvement,Transfer,Improvement,Hseq,Management
jobDescription:
——————————————————————————————————

Manager Process Engineering ASTEC

Godrej Agrovet Ltd

Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

—————————————————————————————————————

Job Title: Manager Process Engineering

Job Type: Permanent, Full-time

Function: Production

Business: Godrej Agrovet Ltd.

Location: Mumbai, Maharashtra, India

About Godrej Industries Group

At the Godrej Industries Group (GIG), we are privileged to serve over 1.1 billion consumers globally through our businesses with market leadership positions in the consumer products, real estate, agriculture, financial services and chemicals industries.

www.godrejindustries.com

Godrej Agrovet

https://www.godrejagrovet.com/

Godrej Agrovet (GAVL) is a conglomerate within the conglomerate, Godrej Group. GAVL has a portfolio of

8 businesses in the agriculture industry, with consolidated revenues of ~1Bn USD. The business is focused

on India, apart from exports in some segments, and a business based in Bangladesh. Many of the business

need to deal with the vagaries of commodities either on the input side or on the output side. For ease of

understanding, these can be seen as three verticals:

Astec focuses on agri intermediates / technical and is a B2B business

Key responsibilities:

This position is responsible for development of new technologies, new product trials, commissioning of new products in plants and supporting Lifecycle of existing products which includes Capacity improvements, cost improvements, HSEQ improvement initiatives in existing plants.

  • Analyzing the observation of Lab trial at R&D and Pilot plant for process optimization & scale up.
  • Review & analyze the Mass balance, energy balance for the R&D & pilot plant process.
  • Responsible for Preparation of BFD PFD, P&ID & Cause & effect matrix for process.
  • Preparation of Standard operation procedure, Operation control Philosophy document for Pilot plant processes.
  • Preparation of Technology transfer package for commercial plant.
  • Leading team of Technology transfer engineer to develop the process in lab & Pilot plant.
  • Analyzing the Process safety data & incorporation of engineering safeguards for process.
  • Hands on experience of Simulation Software like- ASPEN, MIXIT, DYNOCHEM, CHEMCAD.
  • Preparing the project costing for products based on the inhouse & customer process packages.
  • Leading the exploration of new process technology for sustainable process.
  • Ensuring the optimization utilization of resources.

The Candidate

Professional Experience

  • Proven work experience in process engineering
  • Excellent technical skills
  • Knowledge of process related standards
  • Experience in process simulations and knowledge of process engineering softwares
  • Good understanding of chemical reaction hazards and fire and explosions hazards.
  • Should possess knowledge on Raw material, Equipment usage and waste treatment cost calculations.
  • Familiarity with health and safety regulations.

Who are we looking for?

Education:

BE/B. Tech or ME/M. Tech in Chemical Engineering

Experience:

8 – 10 years of industrial experience.

  • Hands on experience of working in Technology transfer & process development department.
  • Hands on experience of Process engineering calculations.
  • Hands on experience of Simulation Software like- ASPEN, MIXIT, DYNOCHEM, CHEMCAD.

What’s in it for you?

Be an equal parent

Childcare benefits for the birthing parent, commissioning parent (in case of surrogacy) or adoptive parent, and their partners

  • 6 months of paid leave for primary caregivers, flexible work options on return for primary caregivers
  • 2 months paid leave for secondary caregivers
  • Caregiver travel for primary caregivers to bring a caregiver and children under a year old, on work travel

Coverage for childbirth and fertility treatment

No place for discrimination at Godrej

Gender-neutral anti-harassment policy

Same sex partner benefits at par with married spouses

Coverage for gender reassignment surgery and hormone replacement therapy

Community partnerships and advocacy

Persons with Disability (PwD) care

We are selfish about your wellness

Comprehensive health insurance plans, as well as accident coverage for you and your family, with top-up options

Elder care for those who might need to extend support to senior family members

Preventative healthcare support

Outpatient Department (OPD) coverage, including vaccinations, dental, vision, etc.

Uncapped sick leave

Flexible work options, including remote working and part-time work

Mental wellness and self-care programmes, resources and counselling

Celebrating wins, the Godrej Way

Structured recognition platforms for individual, team and business-level achievements

Digital and offline instant recognition platforms
